trans-unit.source: Provides compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="ADO Data Control" />, which enabled you to create a connection to a database using Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects (<see langword="ADO" />).
trans-unit.target: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 <see langword="ADO Data Control" /> 的相容性，讓您可以使用 Microsoft ActiveX Data Objects (<see langword="ADO" />) 建立與資料庫的連接。

trans-unit.source: Use this control in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to use an `ADO` data connection.
trans-unit.target: 從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級應用程式中使用此控制項，可繼續使用`ADO`資料連接。

trans-unit.source: For new development, you should consider using `ADO.NET` instead of `ADO`.
trans-unit.target: 進行新開發，您應該考慮使用`ADO.NET`而不是`ADO`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Comparison of ADO.NET and ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[比較的 ADO.NET 和 ADO](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/98f2c0cd-437d-4934-8be5-c174b6782cae)。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 `ADO Data Control`.
trans-unit.target: 提供與 Visual Basic 6.0 的相容性`ADO Data Control`。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Msdatasrc.DataSourceListener" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Msdatasrc.DataSourceListener" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an interface to monitor changes in a data set.
trans-unit.target: 加入介面，以監視資料集中的變更。

trans-unit.source: The `DataSourceListener` monitors a data set for data members that are added, removed, or changed when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC> is connected to a data source.
trans-unit.target: `DataSourceListener`監視資料集的資料成員會加入、 移除或變更時<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC>連接到資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `BackColor` property affects only the part of the control where text is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 設定`BackColor`屬性會影響只會顯示文字控制項的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current row position is before the first row in a <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示目前資料列位置是否位於 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 的第一筆資料列之前。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current row position is before the first row; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料列位置位於第一筆資料列之前，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `BOF` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A> return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid.
trans-unit.target: `BOF`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A>傳回值由目前的資料列指標的位置 this 指標是否有效。

trans-unit.source: If either `BOF` or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A> is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> data causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個`BOF`或<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A>是`true`，沒有任何目前的資料列，而且參考的任何嘗試<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>資料造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `BOF` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A> properties to determine whether an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> as you move from row to row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`BOF`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.EOF%2A>屬性，以決定是否<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>物件包含資料列，或是否您已經超出限制的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>當您移動資料列至資料列。

trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates what action the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> takes when the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示當 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true" /> 時，<see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF" /> 所採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOFActionEnum" /> enumeration that specifies the action to take.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOFActionEnum" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration)，指定要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the behavior when the `MovePrevious` button is pressed and the first row of a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> is the current row.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定行為時`MovePrevious`按下按鈕和第一個資料列的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>目前資料列。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 在本機記憶體中快取的資料錄數目。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that specifies the number of records that are cached in local memory for the current <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，指定目前 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 物件在本機記憶體中快取的資料錄數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 50 records.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 50 筆資料錄。

trans-unit.source: The `CacheSize` value tells the provider how many records to keep in its buffer and how many records to fetch at one time to local memory.
trans-unit.target: `CacheSize`值會告訴提供者，將保留在其緩衝區，一次擷取到本機記憶體的多少筆記錄的記錄數目。

trans-unit.source: For example, when set to 10, after opening the first <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>, the provider fetches the first 10 records into local memory.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當設定為 10，開啟第一個之後<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>，提供者擷取的前 10 個記錄到本機的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, as you move forward from the current record, the provider returns the data values from the local memory buffer.
trans-unit.target: 因此，當您繼續從目前的記錄時，提供者會傳回的資料值從本機記憶體緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: As soon as you move past the last record, the next 10 records are fetched from the data source into the cache.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您跳過最後一筆記錄，接下來的 10 記錄擷取資料來源至快取。

trans-unit.source: While you can change value during the life of the cursor, the change only affects the number of records in the cache after the next fetch from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以變更值的資料指標的生命期限內，變更只會快取中的記錄數目影響之後的下一個提取從資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the duration, in seconds, that the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> waits for a command to return from the server.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 等候伺服器傳回命令的持續期間 (以秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that specifies the number of seconds to wait when a connection is being established.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，指定等候建立連接的秒數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: After this period of time has elapsed without completing the command, the provider raises an exception to the calling application and cancels the command.
trans-unit.target: 這段時間經過而無法完成命令之後，提供者會引發例外狀況呼叫的應用程式，並取消命令。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that informs the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> what type of command to pass when opening a <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會通知 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" />，在開啟 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 時要傳遞的命令類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ADODB.CommandTypeEnum" /> enumeration that specifies the command type.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.CommandTypeEnum" /> 列舉型別，指定命令類型。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property optimizes the execution of the command.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性會將命令的執行最佳化。

trans-unit.source: Gets of sets the information that is used to establish a connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來建立資料來源連接的資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the connection information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含連接資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the `ConnectionString` property to specify a data source by passing a detailed connection string that contains a series of argument = value statements separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 使用`ConnectionString`屬性來指定資料來源，藉由傳遞的詳細的連接字串包含一連串的引數 = 值陳述式，並以分號分隔。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the duration of time, in seconds, for which the provider attempts to connect to the server specified in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.ConnectionString" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定提供者嘗試連接到 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.ConnectionString" /> 屬性中指定之伺服器的持續期間 (以秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="Integer" /> that specifies the number of seconds to wait when a connection is being established.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Integer" />，指定等候建立連接的秒數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 15 秒。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="ADODB.CursorLocationEnum" /> 列舉型別，指定位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ADODB.CursorLocationEnum.adUseClient" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="ADODB.CursorLocationEnum.adUseClient" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`disposing 參數設定為具有方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the disposing parameter set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`disposing 參數設為`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the disposing parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this control references.
trans-unit.target: 當處置參數是`true`，這個方法會釋放任何參考這個控制項的 managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When you override <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請小心不要參考到物件已經處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="EndOfRecordset" /> event is called when there is an attempt to move to a row past the end of the <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試移至超出 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 結尾的資料列時，會呼叫 <see langword="EndOfRecordset" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An `EndOfRecordset` event may occur if the `MoveNext` operation fails.
trans-unit.target: `EndOfRecordset`如果，可能會發生事件`MoveNext`作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current row position is after the last row in a <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示目前資料列位置是否位於 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 的最後一筆資料列之後。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current row position is after the last row; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料列位置位於最後一筆資料列之後，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A> and `EOF` return values are determined by the location of the current row pointer if this pointer is valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A>和`EOF`傳回值由目前的資料列指標的位置 this 指標是否有效。

trans-unit.source: If either <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A> or `EOF` is `true`, there is no current row, and any attempt to reference <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> data causes an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任一個<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A>或`EOF`是`true`，沒有任何目前的資料列，而且參考的任何嘗試<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>資料造成例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A> and `EOF` properties to determine whether an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> object contains rows or whether you have gone beyond the limits of an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A> as you move from row to row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.BOF%2A>和`EOF`屬性，以決定是否<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>物件包含資料列，或是否您已經超出限制的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset%2A>當您移動資料列至資料列。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see langword="Recordset" /> for a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC" /> 控制項的 <see langword="Recordset" /> 變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the statement or query that returns a <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定會傳回 <see cref="P:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Recordset" /> 的陳述式或查詢。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the statement or query.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含陳述式或查詢。

trans-unit.source: The `RecordSource` contains both the name of a database table and a valid SQL string using syntax appropriate for the data source.
trans-unit.target: `RecordSource`包含資料庫資料表和使用語法適用於資料來源的有效 SQL 字串的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see langword="DataSourceListener" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see langword="DataSourceListener" />。

trans-unit.source: The `DataSourceListener` monitors a data set for data members that are added, removed, or changed when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC> is connected to a data source.
trans-unit.target: `DataSourceListener`監視資料集的資料成員會加入、 移除或變更時<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC>連接到資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to communicate information such as the number of the current record to the user.

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 ADO <see langword="Recordset" /> 物件的使用者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a user name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，其中包含使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The user-name syntax depends on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱語法取決於資料來源。

trans-unit.source: When a `UserName` and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Password%2A> are supplied, the control uses the values to create a connection string (<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.ConnectionString%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 當`UserName`和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.Password%2A>所提供，此控制項會使用值來建立連接字串 (<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ADODC.ConnectionString%2A>屬性)。
